verses.name: Daniel 11:25
verses.text: And he shall stir up his power and his courage against the king of the south with a great army; and the king of the south shall be stirred up to battle with a very great and mighty army; but he shall not stand: for they shall forecast devices against him.

verses.name: Daniel 11:26
verses.text: Yea, they that feed of the portion of his meat shall destroy him, and his army shall overflow: and many shall fall down slain.
